name: Life Down
description:
Avoid hearts and get hit by bombs to WIN!

You only get to the next level if your lives reach 0.

When you move to the next level, the difficulty rises, and you will meet new types of hearts that will make your journey harder:

  • Red hearts: normal hearts that increase your lives by 1
  • Green hearts: same as red hearts but they stay longer before disappearing
  • Blue hearts: same as red hearts but their vertical speed is faster
  • Purple hearts: same as red hearts but their horizontal speed is faster
